title: The Governor of Indiana Bans Boyz from wearing 'Gee' colors.
subtitle: An article that states that the Governor of Indiana Mike Pines signed a law prohibiting children from wearing "gay" colors that came from the "sarcastic" section of the Hovington Post.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Governor Indiana, Mike Pines, has signed a law that prevents children from wearing gay colors.
